name: INBETWEEN (kapitankapitan, Sly, Jurij_Kot, upstuts)
description:
Game made for Warsaw Film School Gamejam 2022.
A classic platformer with nocturnal, ghostly atmosphere, storyline driven by player's choices and unique mechanic that allows to switch between dimensions and have two perspectives on the same world. 

Controls:

enter - start/pause

left, right, up, down -  movement

Z - jump/action

X - run

Story:

Are you alive? What is real? Are those occult guys at the cemetery only goofing around? Or did they just evoke you - a lost, damned soul? It's November after all, the month of ghosts... What is more important to you? Riches of this world or eternal salvation? Enter the crypt and decide your fate!

Credits:

Zwickau team:

Tuts- Gfx

Kapitan - Msx

Gorky, Jurij - Level design

Sly - Code
